entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Perf] Slow E2E tests due to unrecycled chrome instances #56004
  • Un-serious Bug?? #56003
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #56002
  • Perf regression: fortunes #56001
  • Perf improvement: json #56000
  • Validation Model not compiling #55999
  • Blazor: Error on adding new scoped CSS since last update #55998
  • Better UX - show "loading" (anything) while app is starting up the .NET WebAssembly runtime (for AutoRender, prerender false) #55997
  • The � symbol "replacement character issue" #55994
  • Blazor hybrid with WPF, memory leak. #55993
  • ArgumentException while OutputCache is cached #55988
  • Blazor InputDate does not work properly #55987
  • Allow BL0005 warning suppression #55986
  • Lazy Loading separate Razor Class Library project in Blazor Web App #55985
  • Recursive symlink created while following Components build script #55983

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55377
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #55991
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, plaintext #55992
  • HealthCheckMiddleware unexpected behavior, still running through the other middlewares in the chain #55972
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55977
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, json #55907
  • [9.0-preview.4] Remove x-aspnetcore-id from OpenAPI responses #55832
    9.0-preview5
  • NET 8 minimal API: Error in AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer 8.0.0 #52388

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9b4993c` to `a7f443b` #55995
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixes #55987 , input date does not work properly on interactive serve… #55990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add hidden input for easier binding in static edit forms #55989
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Fix urls in ProjectTemplates/README #55984
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Update https://docs.microsoft.com to https://learn.microsoft.com #55970
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview6
  • Pass through CancellationToken #55941
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview6
  • Update WithOpenApi docs and scrub description IDs #55924
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview6
  • Update Templates.Mvc.Tests Helix Timeout #55981
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview6
  • UnixCertificateManager: implement IsTrusted. #55335
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Initial implementation of PAR in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Ensure that the hub client proxy generator correctly processes both explicit and inferred generic type arguments #55862
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Log whether the localization resource is found or not #55897
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering
  • Update AuthenticationSchemeProvider.cs public constructor summary punctuation #55919
    community-contribution, area-networking
